name: Latest Tweets Tooltip
author: Adrian Apan

sections.description: A wordpress plugin which will allow you to show the latest tweets about a certain word or phrase in a draggable and resizable jQuery tooltip window.
sections.installation:
1. Download and extract the ‘latest-tweets-tooltip.zip’ archive to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory (or simple use the WordPress admin panel and upload it there: Plugins -> Add New)

  2. Activate the plugin from your admin panel (Plugins)

  3. To use it on a word or phrase just include the word/phrase between the shortcodes [ltt] and [/ltt]
    Example: [ltt]this is a phrase[/ltt]
sections.faq:
1. Where should look for troubleshooting?

For any information, bug reporting, requests visit the official page of the plugin at http://www.cmscrate.com/wordpress/wordpress-plugin-latest-tweets-tooltip

short_description: A wordpress plugin which will allow you to show the latest tweets about a certain word or phrase in a draggable and resizable jQuery tooltip window.
